title: Ticket #4457: config daemon override not working when value matches default.
description:
the config system doesn't honor a config-file based daemon override when the value of the override matches the value in the defaults table. Thus 

    ENABLE_CLASSAD_CACHING = true
    TOOL.ENABLE_CLASSAD_CACHING = false

doesn't work to enable caching for everything but tools. It instead enables caching for everything. This is because the config system doesn't store parameters when they match the defaults, so it stores ENABLE_CLASSAD_CACHING in condor_status because when it parses TOOL.ENABLE_CLASSAD_CACHINE it sees that false is the same value as the config table, so it doesn't store it.
remarks:
2016-Jun-12 15:54:13 by tim:
TJ, wasn't this addressed with #5310 ?

2016-Jun-14 09:38:56 by tim:
Fixed in 8.4.7
creator: johnkn
